message.name: ERR_SERVICE_DRE_SEARCH
message.locale: The organization is already supplying this service at this time.

message.name: ERR_SERVICE_XRV_SERVICESUPPLIERLINK_DATES

message.name: ERR_SERVICE_CESSATION_ENDDATE_EMPTY
message.locale: An end date must be entered for cessation details.
